troubleshooting.title: Navigation to a Web Page is Canceled when Viewing CHM on a Network Drive

keywords.indexterm: Error: Navigation to the web page was canceled

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When viewing a CHM on a network drive, I only see the TOC and an empty page that displays the message: Navigation to the web page was canceled.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This is actually normal behavior. The Microsoft viewer for CHM does not display the topics for a CHM open on a network drive.

steps-informal.p: As a workaround, copy the CHM file on your local system and view it there.
